title: I just lost 17 LP from a remake in Diamond II and I got autofilled

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Why does this happen? I got autofilled, target banned, and on top of that I got a remake where I lost 17 LP. Can anyone help?

replies.body:
If you're in a premade group with someone who triggers the /Remake and you're in Diamond or above, you'll get the same loss penalty as the player who caused the remake. You can find full details on how the system works in our [/Remake FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
I thought premades didn't exist anymore in Diamond?
You can have premades in Diamond, they are just restricted by 3 divisions above/below, as opposed to a full tier. Challenger is the only tier restricted to solo only.
